verses.verse: Then Jacob <WH3290> went <WH5375> on his journey, <WH7272> and came <WH1980> to the land <WH776> of the sons <WH1121> of the east. <WH6924>

And he looked, <WH7200> and saw <WH7200> a well <WH875> in the field, <WH7704> and behold, <WH2009> three <WH7969> flocks <WH5739> of sheep <WH6629> were lying <WH7257> there <WH8033> beside <WH5921> it, for from that well <WH875> they watered <WH8248> the flocks. <WH5739> Now the stone <WH68> on the mouth <WH6310> of the well <WH875> was large. <WH1419>

When all <WH3605> the flocks <WH5739> were gathered <WH622> there, <WH8033> they would then roll <WH1556> the stone <WH68> from the mouth <WH6310> of the well, <WH875> and water <WH8248> the sheep, <WH6629> and put <WH7725> the stone <WH68> back <WH7725> in its place <WH4725> on the mouth <WH6310> of the well. <WH875>
And Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> to them, "My brothers, <WH251> where <WH370> are you from?" And they said, <WH559> "We are from Haran. <WH2771>"
And he said <WH559> to them, "Do you know <WH3045> Laban <WH3837> the son <WH1121> of Nahor <WH5152>?" And they said, <WH559> "We know <WH3045> [him.]"

And he said <WH559> to them, "Is it well <WH7965> with him?" And they said, <WH559> "It is well, <WH7965> and behold, <WH2009> Rachel <WH7354> his daughter <WH1323> is coming <WH935> with the sheep. <WH6629>"

And he said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH2005> it is still <WH5750> high <WH1419> day; <WH3117> it is not time <WH6256> for the livestock <WH4735> to be gathered. <WH622> Water <WH8248> the sheep, <WH6629> and go, <WH1980> pasture <WH7462> them."

But they said, <WH559> "We cannot, <WH3201> <WH3808> until <WH5704> <WH834> all <WH3605> the flocks <WH5739> are gathered, <WH622> and they roll <WH1556> the stone <WH68> from the mouth <WH6310> of the well; <WH875> then we water <WH8248> the sheep. <WH6629>"
While he was still <WH5750> speaking <WH1696> with them, Rachel <WH7354> came <WH935> with her father's sheep, <WH6629> for she was a shepherdess. <WH7462>

And it came <WH1961> about, when <WH9201> Jacob <WH3290> saw <WH7200> Rachel <WH7354> the daughter <WH1323> of Laban <WH3837> his mother's brother, <WH251> and the sheep <WH6629> of Laban <WH3837> his mother's brother, <WH251> that Jacob <WH3290> went <WH5066> up, and rolled <WH1556> the stone <WH68> from the mouth <WH6310> of the well, <WH875> and watered <WH8248> the flock <WH6629> of Laban <WH3837> his mother's brother. <WH251>
Then Jacob <WH3290> kissed <WH5401> Rachel, <WH7354> and lifted <WH5375> his voice <WH6963> and wept. <WH1058>
And Jacob <WH3290> told <WH5046> Rachel <WH7354> that he was a relative <WH251> of her father and that he was Rebekah's son, <WH1> and she ran <WH1121> and told <WH7323> her father.

So it came <WH1961> about, when Laban <WH3837> heard <WH8085> the news <WH8088> of Jacob <WH3290> his sister's son, <WH1121> that he ran <WH7323> to meet <WH7122> him, and embraced <WH2263> him and kissed <WH5401> him, and brought <WH935> him to his house. <WH1004> Then he related <WH5608> to Laban <WH3837> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things. <WH1697>
And Laban <WH3837> said <WH559> to him, "Surely <WH389> you are my bone <WH6106> and my flesh. <WH1320>" And he stayed <WH3427> with him a month. <WH2320>

Then Laban <WH3837> said <WH559> to Jacob, <WH3290> "Because <WH3588> you are my relative, <WH251> should you therefore serve <WH5647> me for nothing <WH2600>? Tell <WH5046> me, what <WH4100> shall your wages <WH4909> be?"
Now Laban <WH3837> had two <WH8147> daughters; <WH1323> the name <WH8034> of the older <WH1419> was Leah, <WH3812> and the name <WH8034> of the younger <WH6996> was Rachel. <WH7354>
And Leah's eyes <WH5869> were weak, <WH7390> but Rachel <WH7354> was beautiful <WH3303> of form <WH8389> and face. <WH4758>
Now Jacob <WH3290> loved <WH157> Rachel, <WH7354> so he said, <WH559> "I will serve <WH5647> you seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> for your younger <WH6996> daughter <WH1323> Rachel. <WH7354>"
And Laban <WH3837> said, <WH559> "It is better <WH2896> that I give <WH5414> her to you than <WH4480> that I should give <WH5414> her to another <WH312> man; <WH376> stay <WH3427> with me."
So Jacob <WH3290> served <WH5647> seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> for Rachel <WH7354> and they seemed <WH1961> <WH5869> to him but a few <WH259> days <WH3117> because of his love <WH160> for her.
Then Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> to Laban, <WH3837> "Give <WH3051> [me] my wife, <WH802> for my time <WH3117> is completed, <WH4390> that I may go <WH935> in to her."
And Laban <WH3837> gathered <WH622> all <WH3605> the men <WH376> of the place, <WH4725> and made <WH6213> a feast. <WH4960>
Now it came <WH1961> about in the evening <WH6153> that he took <WH3947> his daughter <WH1323> Leah, <WH3812> and brought <WH935> her to him; and [Jacob] went <WH935> in to her.
Laban <WH3837> also gave <WH5414> his maid <WH8198> Zilpah <WH2153> to his daughter <WH1323> Leah <WH3812> as a maid. <WH8198>

So it came <WH1961> about in the morning <WH1242> that, behold, <WH2009> it was Leah! <WH3812> And he said <WH559> to Laban, <WH3837> "What <WH4100> is this <WH2088> you have done <WH6213> to me? Was it not for Rachel <WH7354> that I served <WH5647> with you? Why <WH4100> then have you deceived <WH7411> me?"
But Laban <WH3837> said, <WH559> "It is not the practice <WH6213> <WH3651> in our place, <WH4725> to marry <WH5414> off <WH5414> the younger <WH6810> before <WH6440> the first-born.

"Complete <WH4390> the week <WH7620> of this <WH2088> one, <WH2088> and we will give <WH5414> you the other <WH2088> also <WH1571> for the service <WH5656> which <WH834> you shall serve <WH5647> with me for another <WH312> seven <WH7651> years. <WH8141>"
And Jacob <WH3290> did <WH6213> so <WH3651> and completed <WH4390> her week, <WH7620> and he gave <WH5414> him his daughter <WH1323> Rachel <WH7354> as his wife. <WH802>
Laban <WH3837> also gave <WH5414> his maid <WH8198> Bilhah <WH1090> to his daughter <WH1323> Rachel <WH7354> as her maid. <WH8198>

So [Jacob] went <WH935> in to Rachel <WH7354> also, <WH1571> and indeed <WH1571> he loved <WH157> Rachel <WH7354> more <WH4480> than <WH4480> Leah, <WH3812> and he served <WH5647> with Laban for another <WH312> seven <WH7651> years. <WH8141>
Now the Lord <WH3068> saw <WH7200> that Leah <WH3812> was unloved, <WH8130> and He opened <WH6605> her womb, <WH7358> but Rachel <WH7354> was barren. <WH6135>

And Leah <WH3812> conceived <WH2029> and bore <WH3205> a son <WH1121> and named <WH7121> <WH8034> him Reuben, <WH7205> for she said, <WH559> "Because <WH3588> the Lord <WH3068> has seen <WH7200> my affliction; <WH6040> surely <WH3588> now <WH6258> my husband <WH376> will love <WH157> me."

Then she conceived <WH2029> again <WH5750> and bore <WH3205> a son <WH1121> and said, <WH559> "Because <WH3588> the Lord <WH3068> has heard <WH8085> that I am unloved, <WH8130> He has therefore given <WH5414> me this <WH2088> [son] also. <WH1571>" So she named <WH7121> <WH8034> him Simeon. <WH8095>

And she conceived <WH2029> again <WH5750> and bore <WH3205> a son <WH1121> and said, <WH559> "Now <WH6258> this <WH6471> time <WH6471> my husband <WH376> will become <WH3867> attached <WH3867> to me, because <WH3588> I have borne <WH3205> him three <WH7969> sons. <WH1121>" Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> he was named <WH7121> <WH8034> Levi. <WH3878>

And she conceived <WH2029> again <WH5750> and bore <WH3205> a son <WH1121> and said, <WH559> "This <WH6471> time <WH6471> I will praise <WH3034> the Lord. <WH3068>" Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> she named <WH7121> <WH8034> him Judah. <WH3063> Then she stopped <WH5975> bearing. <WH3205>
